alert.note: Alert for Comerio (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 26 at 7:20PM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM AST THIS EVENING... ...REPLACES FLASH FLOOD WARNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive runoff due to recent rains is expected. * WHERE...A portion of Puerto Rico, including the following county, Comerio. * WHEN...Until 745 PM AST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. River or stream flows remain elevated. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 620 PM AST, Rain gages and emergency management reports excessive runoff from recent heavy rains continue to affect the advisory area. Minor flooding is ongoing with rivers and stream remaining at high levels. Between 1 and 4 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Comerio and Palomas. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
